Haste
If a source controlled by a bloodied player would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead. [i](A player is bloodied if their life total is less than or equal to half their starting life total.)[/i]
notes:
Inspiration — Abstract emotion given form

Mechanical Uniqueness — Bloodied keyword

**Designer’s note: Downshifted to rare, trying to save the mythic spot for the crazier effects.

Assistance — Pay/lose life
